mapper.insert: insert into x$statements_with_temp_tables (db, exec_count, total_latency, memory_tmp_tables, disk_tmp_tables, avg_tmp_tables_per_query, tmp_tables_to_disk_pct, first_seen, last_seen, digest, query) values (#{db,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exec_count,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{total_latency,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memory_tmp_tables,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{disk_tmp_tables,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avg_tmp_tables_per_query,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tmp_tables_to_disk_pct,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{first_seen,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{last_seen,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{digest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{query,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select db, exec_count, total_latency, memory_tmp_tables, disk_tmp_tables, avg_tmp_tables_per_query, tmp_tables_to_disk_pct, first_seen, last_seen, digest, query from x$statements_with_temp_tables
